property.name: listMode
property.label: List mode
property.description: Rendering mode of the list element.

property.name: title
property.label: Title
property.description: Title of the list, leave blank if not required.

property.name: links
property.label: Links
property.description: List of links as a JSON array of text, url and icon.
property.default: [{"text":"Link lists let users navigate to related content","url":"#"},{"text":"Arrows indicate a clickable item","url":"#"}]

property.name: cvaLink
property.label: View All Link (Column modes)
property.description: Link to the full list in Markdown link format (column modes only).

property.name: titleClassName
property.label: Title class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied to the title.

property.name: linkClassName
property.label: Link class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied to the link list items.

property.name: anchorClassName
property.label: Anchor class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied to the link anchors.

property.name: iconClassName
property.label: Icon class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied to the link icons.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
